title: Build Your First Self-Driving Car Module (Lane Detection & Path Planning in Python)
subtitle: Building Your Own Autonomous Car

instructor.name: Harpreet Singh
instructor.bio: Harpreet Singh is a Full Self-Driving (FSD) & Robotics Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in AI-driven autonomy, specializing in motion planning, computer vision, and simulation, who has mentored 10,000+ students globally while founding two award-winning Robotics/AI startups recognized by Startup India and Punjab Government, combining deep technical knowledge in AI decision-making and sensor fusion with a passion for advancing intelligent systems through engineering, education and entrepreneurship.

whatYouWillLearn: How to build a lane detection system from scratch using only raw Python + NumPy
Fundamentals of computer vision and image processing techniques used in FSD systems
Principles of trajectory generation and basic path planning for vehicle movement
Introduction to deep learning approaches used in Tesla-style perception pipelines

about.description: This is a free live webinar designed to give you hands-on experience with real self-driving car engineering. You'll not just learn theory — you'll build your first lane detection + path planning system from scratch using nothing but Python.
buildLive: A lane detection module using OpenCV-style operations (without using OpenCV!)
A working simulation to test your lane-following logic
Insights into how neural networks eventually enhance this base system

whoIsThisFor.title: College Students
whoIsThisFor.description: Perfect if you're studying engineering, computer science or robotics and want hands-on experience with autonomous systems.

whoIsThisFor.title: Working Engineers & Developers
whoIsThisFor.description: Ideal for software engineers, mechanical engineers, or roboticists looking to transition into autonomous vehicles.

whoIsThisFor.title: Startup Founders & Innovators
whoIsThisFor.description: For founders and product managers looking to understand the technical foundations of autonomous systems.
